description: [Gallmaker](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0084) sent victims a lure document with a warning that asked victims to “enable content” for execution.(Citation: Symantec Gallmaker Oct 2018)

external_references.description: Symantec Security Response. (2018, October 10). Gallmaker: New Attack Group Eschews Malware to Live off the Land. Retrieved November 27, 2018.
